story:
Short Summary

US Represented  is a transmedia platform dedicated to free speech and creative expression. We showcase writers, artists, and musicians of all ages, creeds, and backgrounds who play a vital role in defining our culture. Our site gives voice to those who deserve to be heard more clearly in an open public forum. In so doing, US Represented acts as a conduit for the creative power in every community we reach. 

All too often, people get trapped in mental silos. US Represented offers a more perceptive, urbane vision of our increasingly complex world. We publish political, historical, and scientific essays, travel and nature articles, and memoirs. Our writers also share smart, stylish short stories, serialized novels, and poetry. We address environmental and sustainability issues as well. Of equal importance, US Represented features an art gallery and a music section. Our plan is to expand and improve the site in order to broaden our readership and give more artists a venue for their work. 

What We Need & What You Get

US Represented needs $75,000 to pay for operating costs, new staff positions, web design upgrades, and the creation of mirror sites throughout the country that will link to the main site. With your help, we will transcend our current financial limitations in order to serve you better.

US Represented's readership already spans the world, and we’re always seeking new talent and challenging those who work with us to nurture their creativity. Our vision is to transform ourselves and the communities in which we live by participating in them. Join us as friends of the site to help make our vision a reality.

The Impact

With its dedication to diverse viewpoints, US Represented serves an ever-expanding audience that appreciates literature, art, and music in a variety of genres. The site features award-winning writers and artists, and we add new content every day. As a result of this campaign and future fundraising activities, US Represented will be able to pay writers and artists for their efforts. Doing so will validate the work we publish and increase its value.

In just two years, our readership has grown to well over 30,000 people, 22,000 of whom are registered on our site. We also have over 7,700 Facebook followers and over 3,000 Twitter followers, but we want to extend our reach even further. We want to share our work with everyone who can access our site.

Challenges

We are quickly outgrowing our chosen platform. Many of our guests access our content on a phone or tablet, so we need to explore new applications in order to meet the needs of our audience. Until now, the site has been funded solely through donations from our staff, and costs continue to increase. Your financial support of US Represented will allow us to grow naturally instead of being constrained by our limited budget.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every donation matters because you matter. The money you invest will allow us to give you a more polished and well-rounded production. We offer great perks for larger contributions, but even donations of $1, $2, or $5 will help considerably. Your support of our campaign will show that you believe in us and want to play a role in our evolution. You can also help by telling others about US Represented. Come visit www.usrepresented.com and spend some time with us. We welcome your company.

Please enjoy the video we made for you. Feel free to share our content with your friends on your favorite social media sites. You can even use the Indiegogo share tools below to do so. Help us give voice to a larger creative community.
story_txt:
Short Summary
US Represented  is a transmedia platform dedicated to free speech and
 creative expression. We showcase writers, artists, and musicians of all ages, creeds, and backgrounds who play a vital role in defining our culture. Our site gives voice to those who deserve to be heard more clearly in an open public forum. In so doing, US Represented acts as a conduit for the creative power in every community we reach. All too often, people get trapped in mental silos. US Represented offers a more perceptive, urbane vision of our increasingly complex world. We publish political, historical, and scientific essays, travel and nature articles, and memoirs. Our writers also share smart, stylish short stories, serialized novels, and poetry. We address environmental and sustainability issues as well. Of equal importance, US Represented features an art gallery and a music section. Our plan is to expand and improve the site in order to broaden our readership and give more artists a venue for their work. 
What We Need & What You Get
US Represented needs $75,000 to pay for operating costs, new staff positions, web design upgrades, and the creation of mirror sites throughout the country that will link to the main site. With your help, we will transcend our current financial limitations in order to serve you better. US Represented's readership already spans the world, and 
we’re always seeking new talent and challenging those who work with us 
to nurture their creativity. Our vision is to transform ourselves and the communities in which we live by participating in them. Join us as friends of the site to help make our vision a reality.

The Impact
With its dedication to diverse viewpoints, US Represented serves an ever-expanding audience that appreciates literature, art, and music
in a variety of genres. The site features award-winning writers and artists, and we add new content every day. As a result of this campaign and future fundraising activities, US Represented will be able to pay writers and artists for their efforts. Doing so will validate the work we publish and increase its value.
In just two years, our readership has grown to well over 30,000 people, 22,000
of whom are registered on our site. We also have over 7,700 Facebook
followers and over 3,000 Twitter followers, but we want to extend our reach even further. We want to share our work with everyone who can access our site.
Challenges
We are quickly outgrowing our chosen platform. Many of our guests access our content on a phone or tablet, so we need to explore
new applications in order to meet the needs of our audience. Until now, the
site has been funded solely through donations from
our staff, and costs continue to increase. Your financial support of US
Represented will allow us to grow naturally instead of being
constrained by our limited budget.
Other Ways You Can Help
Every donation matters because you matter. The money you invest will allow us to give you a more polished and well-rounded production. We offer great perks for larger contributions, but even donations of $1, $2, or $5 will help considerably. Your support of our campaign will show that you believe in us and want to play a role in our evolution. You can also help by telling others about US Represented. Come visit www.usrepresented.com and spend some time with us. We welcome your company.Please enjoy the video we made for you. Feel free to share
our content with your friends on your favorite social media sites. You can even use the Indiegogo share tools below to do so. Help us give voice to a larger creative community.
